summary: This is an email chain from July 22, 2019, regarding an article from the Florida Daily Post titled 'Deemed Dangerous: Epstein Denied Bail in Sex Abuse Case.' The email involves a request to forward the article, likely between individuals associated with the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Special Assistant to the U.S. Attorney
persons.role: Special Assistant to the U.S. Attorney
persons.context: The sender of an email containing an article about Jeffrey Epstein being denied bail, from the United States Attorney's Office, SDNY.

events.title: Epstein Denied Bail
events.description: An article from the Florida Daily Post reports that Jeffrey Epstein was deemed dangerous and denied bail in his sex abuse case.

keyFacts: An email from July 22, 2019, discusses a news article about Jeffrey Epstein being denied bail.
The article's title is 'Deemed Dangerous: Epstein Denied Bail in Sex Abuse Case' from the Florida Daily Post.
The correspondence involves an individual from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
